Method Detail

solve

public java.lang.Boolean solve()
Description copied from class: Solver
The solve method can only be called on a solve which has a puzzle set at state 1.

Once called it will attempt to solve the puzzle and indicate its success or failure.

Returns:
True if a solution was found, False if not.

setPuzzle

public void setPuzzle(Puzzle clues)
Description copied from class: Solver
This method is used to set the puzzle for this solver, a solver should only solve one puzzle in its life.

To solve other puzzle, a new new solver class is instanciated for each puzzle.

Overrides:
setPuzzle in class Solver
Parameters:
clues - should be a puzzle in the 'ready to be solved' state, indicated numerically as state 1.
